definition.achievementDescription: Put on a pair of Glowroot Visors to disable all dazzling effects, and read the amount of light.
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="item_in_inventory" x="16" y="19"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">64</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GlowGoggles.helmet</field></block></value></block><block type="custom_trigger" x="121" y="82"><next><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false"></block></next></block></xml>
